TopicTitle: Is it even possible to return from Eve in 1.0.2?

Articles.Content:
See title. Basically, I have tried every ship design I have seen, but they're all outdated and they're all for <0.90. They just don't have the TWR to lift off anymore, or they use the external command seat which can't be used now because the pilot will overheat. Has anybody figured out a reasonable way to leave Eve? Or am I just doing something wrong?

Edited May 19, 2015 by yorshee
Definitely possible, maccollo has done it: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/29533-What-did-you-do-in-KSP-today?p=1900226&viewfull=1#post1900226

Definitely possible, maccollo has done it: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/29533-What-did-you-do-in-KSP-today?p=1900226&viewfull=1#post1900226

Oh, sweet! That's awesome. Thank you!
It should be even easier now... Instead of shipping a 100+ton lander or whatever, You ship up an empty 20ton lander and use ore to fuel it after it is on eve.
